allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
üöÄ Initial commit: Casa 24 Records Discord Bot

Features:
- 12 slash commands for analytics and predictions
- Real-time data from Spotify, YouTube, Instagram, Discord
- AI predictions using linear regression
- Artist battles and leaderboards
- Achievement system and gamification
- Daily automated data updates via GitHub Actions
- Zero external API dependencies

Bot Commands:
- /stats - Live collective analytics
- /growth - Track growth trends
- /predict - AI-powered predictions
- /artist - Individual artist profiles
- /battle - Head-to-head comparisons
- /leaderboard - Top performers
- /spotlight - Daily artist feature
- /viral - Viral potential analysis
- /momentum - Velocity tracking
- /milestones - Achievement tracking
- /weekly - Weekly reports
- /achievements - Gamification system

)")
Bash(git commit -m "Fix data loading for artist command and improve .gitignore")
Bash(git add bot/.env bot/index.js GITHUB_SECRETS_GUIDE.md bot/.gitignore)

Bash(git commit -m "üîê Security Update: Remove exposed token and add GitHub Secrets guide

- Removed exposed Discord token from .env (token likely revoked by Discord)
- Added placeholder in .env for GitHub Secrets integration
- Updated bot to load .env.local for local development
- Added comprehensive GitHub Secrets setup guide
- Improved .gitignore to exclude all .env variants

IMPORTANT: Follow GITHUB_SECRETS_GUIDE.md to:
1. Regenerate your bot token
2. Add it to GitHub Secrets as DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN
3. Use .env.local for local development")
